API¶

The secure_torch package provides a drop-in replacement for torch with security enforcement built in.

  • API Reference

Auto-generated API docs¶

secure_torch — Model Trust Gateway

Drop-in replacement for torch with signature verification, trust policy enforcement, and sandbox isolation.

Usage:

import secure_torch as torch model = torch.load(“model.pt”) model = torch.load(“model.pt”, require_signature=True) model = torch.load(“model.pt”, trusted_publishers=[“huggingface.co/meta”])

secure_torch.load(f, *, require_signature=False, trusted_publishers=None, audit_only=False, max_threat_score=20, sandbox=False, sbom_path=None, bundle_path=None, pubkey_path=None, map_location=None, weights_only=True, **kwargs)[source]¶

Drop-in replacement for torch.load() with trust enforcement.

Parameters:

  • f – Path to model file (str/Path) or file-like object.

  • require_signature (bool) – Raise SecurityError if no valid signature found.

  • trusted_publishers (Optional[list[str]]) – List of trusted publisher identities (e.g. “huggingface.co/meta”).

  • audit_only (bool) – If True, load the model but always return (model, report) tuple.

  • max_threat_score (int) – Block load if cumulative threat score exceeds this (0–100).

  • sandbox (bool) – If True, load inside a restricted subprocess.

  • sbom_path (Optional[str]) – Path to SPDX SBOM JSON. Auto-detected as <model>.spdx.json if None.

  • bundle_path (Optional[str]) – Path to Sigstore bundle. Auto-detected as <model>.sigstore if None.

  • pubkey_path (Optional[str]) – Path to public key for offline verification.

  • map_location – Passed through to torch.load (ignored for safetensors/ONNX).

  • weights_only (bool) – Passed through to torch.load (default True for safety).

secure_torch.save(obj, f, **kwargs)[source]¶

Pass-through to torch.save (no security restrictions on saving).

secure_torch.from_pretrained(model_name_or_path, *, require_signature=False, trusted_publishers=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

HuggingFace-style from_pretrained() with trust enforcement. Delegates to transformers.AutoModel.from_pretrained after validation.

Parameters:

  • model_name_or_path (str)

  • require_signature (bool)

  • trusted_publishers (list[str] | None)

exception secure_torch.UnsafePickleError[source]¶

Bases: SecureTorchError

Raised when a dangerous pickle opcode is detected.

exception secure_torch.SecurityError[source]¶

Bases: SecureTorchError

Raised when a security policy is violated.

exception secure_torch.SignatureRequiredError[source]¶

Bases: SecurityError

Raised when require_signature=True but no valid signature is found.

exception secure_torch.UntrustedPublisherError[source]¶

Bases: SecurityError

Raised when the model’s signer is not in trusted_publishers.

exception secure_torch.UnsafeModelError[source]¶

Bases: SecureTorchError

Raised when a model fails threat scoring gate.
